author: Joe Tansey
title: NFL Draft 2020: Start Time, Live Stream and TV Coverage for First Round
description: Joe Burrow should add No. 1 overall pick in the 2020  NFL  draft to the list of achievements he has earned in the last year.   The LSU quarterback surged up draft boards by winning the Heisman Trophy and College Football Playoff National Championship...
content:
Gerald Herbert/Associated Press
Joe Burrow should add No. 1 overall pick in the 2020 NFL draft to the list of achievements he has earned in the last year. 
The LSU quarterback surged up draft boards by winning the Heisman Trophy and College Football Playoff… [+3377 chars]
